title: Form Builder Clone Group: Default Settings
Form Builder Clone: CSS and Disabled

fields.label: Other Field
fields.name: other
fields.message: Automatically append 'Other' field to Select Options which toggles a text input field that allow users type an option.

fields.label: Help Message
fields.name: help
fields.placeholder: Eg. Email is not required but must be valid

fields.label: Grouping
fields.name: grouping
fields.instructions: Manage multiple inputs in a row

fields.message: Form builder is still in beta so please refer to the developer before changing advanced features of this form.

fields.label: Hide Labels
fields.name: hide_labels
fields.message: Placeholders will be automatically added if labels are hidden.

fields.label: Wrap Form
fields.name: wrap_form
fields.message: Adds a border around the form and removes border from error messages.

fields.label: Show Page in Email
fields.name: show_page_in_email
fields.message: Show page name and link in email. (Useful if form appears on multiple pages.)

fields.label: Show Edit Link
fields.name: show_edit_link
fields.message: Shows an Edit Form link to users with form editing capabilities.

fields.label: Save Submission
fields.name: save_submission
fields.message: Save a permanent copy of each form submission in the WordPress backend.

fields.label: GDPR
fields.name: gdpr
fields.instructions: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy for all individuals within the European Union.

sub_fields.label: Main message
sub_fields.name: main_message
sub_fields.default_value: We would love to keep in touch with you, if you’re happy for us to do that please let us know below:

sub_fields.label: Opt in
sub_fields.name: opt_in
sub_fields.instructions: This will determine what options you show to the end user.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.name: message
sub_fields.instructions: Edit this so it is GDPR compliant
sub_fields.default_value: I am happy to receive marketing information from [YOUR_SITE] by: (please tick all that apply)

sub_fields.label: Disclaimer
sub_fields.name: disclaimer
sub_fields.instructions: An additional message explaining to the user what their rights are.
sub_fields.default_value:
You can opt out of receiving messages at any time by using the unsubscribe button on any of the messages you receive. You can withdraw your information at any time by emailing [YOUR_EMAIL].

Marketing information refers to information on appointed reminders, news, products and services including competitions, promotions, offers, advertisements and prize draws.

sub_fields.label: Save Location
sub_fields.name: save_location
sub_fields.instructions: Ensure that Directory Listing is disabled on this folder for sensitive files.
